message.content:
We first extract the key figures and then calculate each ratio step‐by‐step.

1. Free Cash Flow (FCF)  
 FCF is calculated as the sum of Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities and Net Cash Flow from Investing Activities.  
 • Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities = –967147.02  
 • Net Cash Flow from Investing Activities = –1213417.20  
 → FCF = –967147.02 + (–1213417.20) = –2180564.22  

2. Return on Assets (ROA)  
 ROA = (Net Profit) / (Average Total Assets)  
 • Net Profit = 112375.10  
 • Total Assets at start (from balance sheet initial amount): 16000000.00  
 • Total Assets at end: 23717525.01  
 Average Total Assets = (16000000.00 + 23717525.01) / 2 = 19858762.505  
 → ROA = 112375.10 / 19858762.505 ≈ 0.00566 or 0.57%  

3. Return on Equity (ROE)  
 ROE = (Net Profit) / (Average Owner’s Equity)  
 • Net Profit = 112375.10  
 • Owner’s Equity at start: 16000000.00  
 • Owner’s Equity at end: 16112375.10  
 Average Owner’s Equity = (16000000.00 + 16112375.10) / 2 = 16056187.55  
 → ROE = 112375.10 / 16056187.55 ≈ 0.00700 or 0.70%  

4. Operating Cash Flow to Net Income Ratio  
 This ratio = Operating Cash Flow from Operating Activities / Net Profit  
 → = –967147.02 / 112375.10 ≈ –8.61  
 (The negative sign indicates that the operating cash flow is negative while net profit is positive.)  

5. Net Profit Margin  
 Net Profit Margin = (Net Profit) / (Total Revenue)  
 • Net Profit = 112375.10  
 • Total Revenue = 775598.77  
 → Net Profit Margin = 112375.10 / 775598.77 ≈ 0.1449, or 14.49%  

6. Gross Profit Margin  
 Gross Profit Margin = (Gross Profit) / (Total Revenue)  
 • Gross Profit = 279378.77  
 • Total Revenue = 775598.77  
 → Gross Profit Margin = 279378.77 / 775598.77 ≈ 0.36, or 36.00%

Thus, the final answer is:

{
  "solution": {
    "Free Cash Flow (FCF)": "-2180564.22",
    "Return on Assets (ROA)": "0.57%",
    "Return on Equity (ROE)": "0.70%",
    "Operating Cash Flow to Net Income Ratio": "-8.61",
    "Net Profit Margin": "14.49%",
    "Gross Profit Margin": "36.00%"
  }
}
